oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-08-20 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 20, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Don Gibson (host/performer), guest performer Roy Drusky, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1089th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Don Gibson; Jordanaires; Roy Drusky; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Don Gibson -- Far, Far Away (Don Gibson, Jordanaires) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Don Gibson introduces the Jordanaires -- Ain't Gonna Study War No More (Jordanaires) -- Don Gibson introduces Roy Drusky -- Anymore (Roy Drusky) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Don Gibson) -- Don Gibson introduces Tommy Jackson -- Katy Hill (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Grant Turner and Don Gibson talk -- Lord I'm Coming Home (Don Gibson, Jordanaires) -- Don Gibson introduces Chet Atkins -- White Silver Sands (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jackson, Tommy; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jordanaires (Musical group); Campbell, Archie; Gibson, Don (Donald Eugene), 1928-2003; Drusky, Roy
